info.title: Midtown CRUD API
info.description: This is the Base API that the entire thing is built from

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: This is the max amount of whatever record you are requesting.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of records to omit from start of scan.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order of database scan. Must be an attribute of the type

parameters.name: dir
parameters.description: Direction of the ordering from the order parameter.

post.description: List all of the contracts that have a specific attribute: value pairs.

Record-Request-Definition.title: Record Request Definition
Record-Request-Definition.description: This is a request to get or delete an object.

Appointment-Response.description: This is a successful response with a single Appointment Object

Appointment-List-Response.description: This is a successful response with a list of Appointment Objects

Appointment-Remove-Response.description: This is a successful response from removing a single Appointment Object
